# LeafProperty.ProcessorInfoAndFeatures.Features.PCID property

Gets a value representing the key to retrieve the property value.

Process-context identifiers. A value of true indicates that the processor supports PCIDs.

Key Composition

* Leaf: ProcessorInfoAndFeatures
* Property: PCID
* Unit: None

Return Value

Type: Boolean

```csharp
public static IPropertyKey PCID { get; }
```
